FuncDef: This command references a named BFD template to be used by LSP BFD. The template specifies parameters, such as the minimum transmit and receive control packet timer intervals, to be used by the BFD session. Templates are configured under theconfig>router>bfdcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a text string name for the template of up to 32 characters in printable 7-bit ASCII, enclosed in double quotes.
